sql.query:
SELECT prod_img1, prod_img2, prod_img3, prod_img4
FROM m_product
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.EditProductId}} */

UPDATE m_product
SET market_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */, rest_id = :P2 /* {{$_POST.rest_id}} */, category_id = :P3 /* {{$_POST.category_id}} */, brand_id = :P4 /* {{$_POST.brand_id}} */, prod_mark_id = :P5 /* {{$_POST.prod_mark_id}} */, prod_occurance_id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.prod_occurance_id}} */, prod_name_en = :P7 /* {{$_POST.prod_name_en}} */, prod_name_bn = :P8 /* {{$_POST.prod_name_bn}} */, prod_name_hin = :P9 /* {{$_POST.prod_name_hin}} */, prod_desc_en = :P10 /* {{$_POST.prod_desc_en}} */, prod_desc_bn = :P11 /* {{$_POST.prod_desc_bn}} */, prod_desc_hin = :P12 /* {{$_POST.prod_desc_hin}} */, prod_img1 = :P13 /* {{$_POST.prod_img1?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile1.name:''}} */, prod_img2 = :P14 /* {{$_POST.prod_img2?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile2.name:''}} */, prod_img3 = :P15 /* {{$_POST.prod_img3?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile3.name:''}} */, prod_img4 = :P16 /* {{$_POST.prod_img4?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile4.name:''}} */, status = :P17 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, remarks = :P18 /* {{$_POST.remarks}} */, updated_on = :P19 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE id = :P20 /* {{$_POST.EditProductId}} */

INSERT INTO r_price_table
(prod_id, quantity, q_unit, mrp, purchase_price, selling_price, product_tax, comm_per, comm_val, charge_per, charge_val, status, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.EditProductId}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.quantity[$index]}} */, :P3 /* {{$value}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.mrp[$index]}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.purchase_price[$index]}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.selling_price[$index]}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.product_tax[$index]}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.comm_per[$index]}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.comm_val[$index]}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.charge_per[$index]}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.charge_val[$index]}} */, :P12 /* {{1}} */, :P13 /* {{identity}} */, :P14 /* {{NOW}} */)

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountPrice
FROM r_price_table
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.price_id[$index]}} */ AND prod_id = :P2 /* {{$_POST.EditProductId}} */

INSERT INTO r_price_table
(prod_id, quantity, q_unit, mrp, purchase_price, selling_price, product_tax, comm_per, comm_val, charge_per, charge_val, status, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.EditProductId}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.quantity[$index]}} */, :P3 /* {{$value}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.mrp[$index]}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.purchase_price[$index]}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.selling_price[$index]}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.product_tax[$index]}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.comm_per[$index]}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.comm_val[$index]}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.charge_per[$index]}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.charge_val[$index]}} */, :P12 /* {{1}} */, :P13 /* {{identity}} */, :P14 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE r_price_table
SET quantity = :P1 /* {{$_POST.quantity[$index]}} */, q_unit = :P2 /* {{$value}} */, mrp = :P3 /* {{$_POST.mrp[$index]}} */, purchase_price = :P4 /* {{$_POST.purchase_price[$index]}} */, selling_price = :P5 /* {{$_POST.selling_price[$index]}} */, product_tax = :P6 /* {{$_POST.product_tax[$index]}} */, comm_per = :P7 /* {{$_POST.comm_per[$index]}} */, comm_val = :P8 /* {{$_POST.comm_val[$index]}} */, charge_per = :P9 /* {{$_POST.charge_per[$index]}} */, charge_val = :P10 /* {{$_POST.charge_val[$index]}} */, status = :P11 /* {{1}} */, updated_on = :P12 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE id = :P13 /* {{$_POST.price_id[$index]}} */

SELECT COUNT(m_product.id) AS CountId
FROM m_product
INNER JOIN m_market AS mm ON (mm.id = m_product.market_id)
WHERE m_product.market_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */

SELECT market_code
FROM m_market
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */

INSERT INTO m_product
(prod_id, market_id, rest_id, category_id, brand_id, prod_mark_id, prod_occurance_id, prod_name_en, prod_name_bn, prod_name_hin, prod_desc_en, prod_desc_bn, prod_desc_hin, prod_img1, prod_img2, prod_img3, prod_img4, status, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{ProductId}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.rest_id}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.category_id}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.brand_id}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.prod_mark_id}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.prod_occurance_id}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.prod_name_en}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.prod_name_bn}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.prod_name_hin}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.prod_desc_en}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.prod_desc_bn}} */, :P13 /* {{$_POST.prod_desc_hin}} */, :P14 /* {{$_POST.prod_img1?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile1.name:''}} */, :P15 /* {{$_POST.prod_img2?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile2.name:''}} */, :P16 /* {{$_POST.prod_img3?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile3.name:''}} */, :P17 /* {{$_POST.prod_img4?+'/assets/img/product/'+uploadFile4.name:''}} */, :P18 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, :P19 /* {{$_POST.remarks}} */, :P20 /* {{identity}} */, :P21 /* {{NOW}} */)

(prod_id, quantity, q_unit, mrp, purchase_price, selling_price, product_tax, comm_per, comm_val, charge_per, charge_val, status, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddProduct.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.quantity[$index]}} */, :P3 /* {{$value}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.mrp[$index]}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.purchase_price[$index]}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.selling_price[$index]}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.product_tax[$index]}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.comm_per[$index]}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.comm_val[$index]}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.charge_per[$index]}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.charge_val[$index]}} */, :P12 /* {{1}} */, :P13 /* {{identity}} */, :P14 /* {{NOW}} */)
